overview: Deana Bergquist oversees all of Demand Media’s international business operations. Previous to Demand Media, Deana was the vice president and general manager of international business with Shopping.com, an eBay-owned company. In her seven-year tenure, Deana built out operations in the UK, France, Germany, Australia and Dublin. Deana also held roles in business development, sales, merchant operations and product catalog operations. Before Shopping.com, Deana held management positions at Excite@Home and on the NASA Science Internet Project at NASA Ames Research Center in California. Deana holds a B.A. in Political Science from Central College. She also attended the Engalitcheff Institute on Comparative Political and Economic Systems, one of Washington’s top academic and internships programs, worked in the British Parliament, and completed the Sorbonne’s FranÃ§ais Langue Ã‰trangÃ¨re program.
